turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there. I'd like to get an espresso at Starbucks in Cortland.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, did you want an espresso or another type of drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like another type of drink actually.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have a caramel macchiato?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yum and did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of milk did you want in that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i have you wanting a short iced caramel macchiato with 2% milk and whipped cream from starbucks in portland.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That was Cortland, New York not Portland.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: oops, got it. cortland, new york.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for the order will be $4.50.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've ordered your drink for you at Starbucks in Cortland New York. it should be ready for pick up in 9 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else i can do for you?
